interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.
The U.S. is home to the world's largest economy.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
Germany is known for its engineering and automotive industries.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
China is the world's most populous country.
South Africa has three capital cities.
France is the most visited country in the world.
